content.description:
Hostibus muros urbis ascendentibus cives rogabant 
quid se facerent.
content.question: In the sentence, Hostibus muros urbis ascendentibus is translated

choices.label: because the walls of the hostile cities are being climbed
after the walls of the hostile cities had been climbed
while the enemies are about to climb the walls of the city
since the enemies were climbing the walls of the city

content.answer: since the enemies were climbing the walls of the city
